cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Education and Labor on March 16, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3114, Longshore and Harbor Workers’ COVID-19  Compensation Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 81 (Tuesday, May 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MRVAN:
H.R. 3114.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Congress enacts this bill pursuant to Clause 1 of
Section 8 of Article I and Clause 3 of Section 8 of Article I
of the United States Constitution.
[Page H2196]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 387.

title: Longshore and Harbor Workers’ COVID–19 Compensation Act of 2022
